response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit. We are offering this remarkable piece at a special price of $950,000. We understand that such an investment is not to be taken lightly, and we assure you that it will undoubtedly be a valuable addition to your collection or endeavors. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
